title: From the World of John Wick: Ballerina
description: It stars Ana de Armas as a ballerina and assassin Eve Macarro, who takes on an army of killers as she avenges the death of her father.

title: One of Them Days
description: When best friends and roommates Dreux and Alyssa discover Alyssa's boyfriend has blown their rent money, the duo finds themselves going to extremes.

title: Straw
description: What will be her last straw? A devastatingly bad day pushes a hardworking single mother to the breaking point and into a shocking act of desperation.

title: Havoc
description: When a drug heist swerves lethally out of control, a jaded cop fights his way through a corrupt city's criminal underworld to save a politician's son.

title: Madea's Destination Wedding
description: Set at the Atlantis Bahamas resort, the comedy follows Madea and the Simmons family as they navigate chaotic events surrounding a grandniece's wedding, including a lively bachelor party and suspicions that something is wrong.

title: Breath of Life
description: Exploring life and destiny, where one must live to fulfill their purpose and cannot die until it is completed.

title: G20
description: Terrorists take over the G20 summit with President Sutton, bringing her governing and military experience to defend her family, company, and the world.

title: Jackpot!
description: In the near future, a 'Grand Lottery' has been established - the catch: kill the winner before sundown to legally claim their multi-billion dollar jackpot.

title: A Star is Born
description: A movie star helps a young singer and actress find fame, even as age and alcoholism send his own career into a downward spiral.
